text: Ann-Britt Ryd Pettersson, born 19 March 1954, is a Swedish news reporter at Sveriges Television. She began working for SR Blekinge by the late 1970s. She then became host for regional news program Ã–stnytt. In 1980, she became first female employee by the SVT sports section. She was awarded the special prize during the 2018 Kristallen Awards. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish journalists
title: Ann-Britt Ryd Pettersson
